original_text: And they came again to Jerusalem. And as he was walking in the temple, the chief priests and the scribes and the elders came to him,
korean_text: 그들이 다시 예루살렘에 들어가니라 예수께서 성전에서 거니실 때에 대제사장들과 서기관들과 장로들이 나아와

sentences.original_text: And they came again to Jerusalem.
And as he was walking in the temple,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 성전에서 걷고 있을 때,

sentences.original_text: the chief priests and the scribes and the elders came to him,
